property.name: www_folder
property.description: Where to put the web files?

property.name: admin_user
property.description: Username of the twiki admin user.

property.name: enable_pam_auth
property.description: Use PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) for hue to find users and authenticate them. This will automatically create accounts in hue for users registered on the system, and so integrate with FreeIPA if you have it installed

property.name: ldap_enabled
property.description: Flag to enable LDAP if FreeIPA is installed in the cluster. This experimental feature does not currently work.

property.name: ldap_bind_password
property.description: Password of the binding user. If using ldap this must also be set!

property.name: auth_group
property.description: Name of the authorization group where twiki will look for its users.
